website_summaries.verdict: Versatile and gentle facial bar for all skin types.
pros: Works great for brightening up dull spots and evening skin tone
Boasts an ideal pH level of 6.5 to adequately cleanse skin without over-drying
Serves as a decent makeup remover, as well

customer_reviews.title: IT'S NOT JUST FOR FACES ANYMORE
customer_reviews.text: I started using this unscented soap as a body cleansing bar soap at the recommendation of the x-ray technicians when I was undergoing external radiation treatment for cancer, since it leaves no residue when rinsed. I liked the clean feeling so much that I have continued to use it as such for many years since then.
customer_reviews.author: kcm

customer_reviews.title: Good basic face wash
customer_reviews.text: When I was younger I used the, but switched over to this one when my skin no longer had ongoing teenage breakouts. I have more "complicated" products on hand for specific skin concerns, but sometimes I just want a simple face wash that gets my face clean without overdrying: this bar is perfect for that. I tried the liquid version of this Neutrogena soap, but I prefer the way the bar foams and feels. NOTE: like most bar soap, this will get gross if it doesn't dry properly between uses. Make sure you keep it in the type of soap dish that completely raises it up so air can circulate underneath.
customer_reviews.author: LegoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this soap at Walgreens and fell in love with it. Then, I found it less expensive here on Amazon, and I have been buying it online. I have oily skin and it controls it perfectly. I am not a professional, but I recommend it to people with acne prone skin and oily face.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Not sensitive enough for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Upon reading that this product was good for sensitive skin, I purchased it right away. However, when I used it for the first time today, it left my face with red blotches :/ UPDATE: This soap works well, if you use it while showering. But, if you're simply washing your face outside of the shower, it may leave the red blotches- as I stated previously.
customer_reviews.author: Meowchlle

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this face soap. It doesn't cost an arm and a leg and it doesn't dry out my skin. It cleans my face and keeps breakouts from happening. I have used Mary Kay, Clinique and other brands that charge so much for something that works just as well as this wonderful bar of soap. It lasts a long time and does what it says. Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah O.

customer_reviews.title: Great facial bars
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful facial bars. My mom's dermatologist told her only to use glycerine soap on her face, so I've been doing that for years. It washes off very easily with no residue, doesn't dry out your face, and it takes a while to get through a bar. I got a great value on Prime Pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Jagroo

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing.....
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been washing my face in the shower with Neuutogena for decades after my dermintologist recomended I use it. I like Neutrogena as it never dries out my face after cleaning, even in the dead of the dry winters. This product is a home run, period.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: About Face
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over 5 years. It is gentle on the face and cleans very well. I would put this product up against the more expensive ones in the facial cleaning category. Excellent value and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie House

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been using this for about 5 years and this order is horrible. The soap smells like hair relaxer
customer_reviews.text: I’m writing this specifically for the vendor. I’ve been using this for about 5 years and this order is horrible. The soap smells like hair relaxer, it burns the life out of my face (leaving dry patches and my face VERY sensitive) and just doesn’t live up to the other ones that I’ve purchased on and off amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sunrise H

customer_reviews.title: Great Facial Wash for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and have finally found this to be the best soap for my face. It doesn't dry my skin our and doesnt' smell overpowering. It has such a great feel after I wash my face. Fresh and soft. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boycott Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, but Amazon supports ICE and is helping to share info to detain “immigrants” so please stop using this app thank you!
customer_reviews.author: shjdjdjs

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena Bar
customer_reviews.text: I've used this bar for years so I definitely like the quality and ingredients in this.
customer_reviews.author: Tina P. Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm a frequent buyer of this product. The only facial cleaning thing I've been using for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap bar and helps get rid of acne

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it feels on my face and I will purchase it again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use today...pimples will go away
customer_reviews.text: Does not dry out my skin and my pimples are fading away over time. Keeps my face Looking fresh and feeling very clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Chaneil

customer_reviews.title: Great facial bar soap
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap for cleaning my face. My face actually feels cleaner than when I use other soaps. The others seem to leave a residue on my skin that I don't like. Neutrogena doesn't. Just leaves a nice clean soft face that I like.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any skin! It saved mine.
customer_reviews.text: I was having a lot of problems breaking out and I kept switching from product to product. All of my problems stopped when I started using this! The lack of dye and fragrance has helped my skin so much. I use it everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product ! I'm not sure how much it has helped with my acne but I surely do not break out as much as I previously have. I think it really helps my face feel moisturized and helped get rid of some dry patches. I will be recording !
customer_reviews.author: jayy

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena soap
customer_reviews.text: My wine likes it a lot. She says it is good for her skin.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Patel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those perfect product that, in my opinion, no one should have anything negative to say. I my be bias as I love all Neutrogena products.
customer_reviews.author: Red Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: This has always been a great product. No detergent
customer_reviews.text: This has always been a great product. No detergent. It cleans the skin better. Packing light (camping)? Leave the toothpaste and shampoo at home.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kappeler

customer_reviews.title: Get it at Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for over fifty years. Under two dollars a bar! Wow
customer_reviews.author: Ray R Brockett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great intro product for young folk entering "that" stage of life.
customer_reviews.author: MMJ

customer_reviews.title: Good product, lousy shipping
customer_reviews.text: Good product, lousy Pantry shipping -- had to clean honey off almost everything in the shipping box.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT PRODUCT FOR ANYONE WITH SENSITIVE SKIN: DERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this and three other facial bars for over 35 years now, so I should have purchased stock in the company by now :-) Anyway, there is nothing wrong with using ANYTHING Neutrogena. My dermatologist recommended it to me back then and I have never stopped using it; if I cannot find it, then I try to buy one of the other three she recommended. It was not due to acne--thank God I never had that problem; it was due to sensitive skin. If I use a product that has too many chemicals in it, I break out in a rash, so she recommended this--and the other three.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene R.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Puchased this bar for my 16 year old. Has heped him clear up acne on face
customer_reviews.author: esther

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It helped clearing my face up since I suffer from acne
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my skin very dry but it does the job ...
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my skin very dry but it does the job on most of my acne but I remommens an exfoliater also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long time user
customer_reviews.text: I've used Neutrogena for years and have always been very happy with it because it contains nothing to irritate my skin and does not dry it out.
customer_reviews.author: beasley

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I use it twice a day and it really helps me keep my face clear of pesky pimples. I have oily acne prone skin, and when I use this stuff it makes my face feel very clean and it has helped to clear up some of my acne.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best soap I've used.
customer_reviews.text: It's a quality soap, but if you use it more than 3 times in a week it will melt into a little ball of nothing. I use it. My kids use it. I think it's been used more than three times a week. But everyone likes it. I don't mind buying a couple of bars when I go shopping.
customer_reviews.author: just Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena Original Fragrance-Free Facial Cleansing Bar with Glycerin
customer_reviews.text: Item is perfect. Works exceptionally well. Great value and price. Neutrogena products are worth the cost. This item was easy on the wallet though. A+++++++
customer_reviews.author: JM

product_meta.title: Neutrogena Original Fragrance-Free Facial Cleansing Bar with Glycerin, Pure & Transparent Gentle Face Wash Bar Soap, Free of Harsh Detergents, Dyes & Hardeners, 3.5 oz
product_meta.description:
Take care of your skin with Neutrogena Fragrance-Free Facial Cleansing Bar. Designed for all skin types, this transparent facial bar provides pure and gentle cleansing for clean, clear, healthier-looking skin. From a Dermatologist Recommended Brand, this formula removes excess oil and then rinses clean without leaving behind any pore-clogging residue. Glycerin-rich and non-comedogenic, the facial bar is free of fragrances and harsh detergents, dyes, and hardeners, so it won't irritate skin.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Product Dimensions :1.25 x 3.35 x 2.25 inches; 3.5 Ounces
 * Date First Available :June 13, 2014
 * Manufacturer :Neutrogena
 * ASIN :B00KZ29KMW

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars140 ratings Take care of your skin with Neutrogena Fragrance-Free Facial Cleansing Bar. Designed for all skin types, this transparent facial bar provides pure and gentle cleansing for clean, clear, healthier-looking skin. From a Dermatologist Recommended Brand, this formula removes excess oil and then rinses clean without leaving behind any pore-clogging residue. Glycerin-rich and non-comedogenic, the facial bar is free of fragrances and harsh detergents, dyes, and hardeners, so it won't irritate skin.
feature_bullets: 3.5-ounce Neutrogena Facial Cleansing Bar in Original Fragrance-Free Formula for gentle, daily facial cleansing from a dermatologist-recommended skin care brand
This pure cleansing bar is designed for all skin types and lathers up to remove excess oil and gently cleanse skin
Featuring the original Neutrogena formula, the face soap bar is glycerin-rich to attract moisture and contains no harsh detergents, dyes or hardeners that can irritate the skin
Our face cleansing bar is exceptionally clean-rinsing without leaving behind any pore-clogging residue, for clear, healthier-looking skin
The pure and gentle formula of this facial soap bar is fragrance-free, hypoallergenic and suitable for daily use
Fragrance Free Transparent Facial Bar Original Formula by Neutrogena for Unisex 35 oz Facial Bar
Fragrance Free Transparent Facial Bar Original Formula by Neutrogena for Unisex
Pure, gentle and hypoallergenic; contains no harsh detergents, dyes or hardeners
Ideal for all skin types; 100% fragrance free
